Opinion: How should we thank the 'guardian angels' toiling in long-term care homes? Certainly not with deportation, by @picardonhealth   https://t.co/zcuykxBgIw via @GlobeDebate #Covid19 #cdnpoli #LTC #JeMeSouviendrai

Long-term care shouldn't be a death sentence. It was for my father-he died 10 days ago.  82% of #COVID19 deaths are in LTC. For-profit LTC has 4x as many COVID19 deaths.  Senior care is a right. Long-term care must be part of the Canada Health Act #cdnpoli  https://t.co/xJJTrRkfSv
Human connection is essential for life. Let family caregivers visit their loved ones.  #COVID19 #LTC
